articles.description: Actor says separation ‘was the right decision’
articles.content:
Angelina Jolie has revealed the reason she split from Brad Pitt in 2016, after little more than two years of marriage.
During an interview with Vogue magazine, the Lara Croft: Tomb Raider star said … [+15816 chars]

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Black Parade: Beyonce drops surprise new track and launches directory of black-owned businesses - Sky News
articles.description: The influential artist launched a project providing an online directory of businesses owned by black people.
